name: Angular
description: Angular.dev is the official hub for Angular, a platform for building scalable web applications.
longDescription: Angular.dev is the official website for Angular, a popular open-source framework maintained by Google for developing dynamic and scalable web applications. It serves developers by providing comprehensive documentation, tutorials, and tools to build robust single-page applications (SPAs). The platform emphasizes a component-based architecture, enabling developers to create reusable and maintainable code. Angular.dev also offers resources for both beginners and experienced developers, fostering a community-driven approach to learning and collaboration. Its mission is to empower developers to build high-performance applications with a focus on productivity and scalability.
features: Comprehensive documentation provides detailed guides and API references for building Angular applications.
Interactive tutorials help developers learn Angular concepts through hands-on coding exercises.
Angular CLI offers a powerful command-line interface to streamline project setup, development, and deployment.
Component-based architecture enables reusable and modular code for efficient app development.
Built-in testing tools support unit and end-to-end testing to ensure application reliability.
Angular Universal facilitates server-side rendering for improved performance and SEO.
Community support through forums and GitHub fosters collaboration and issue resolution.
Regular updates ensure compatibility with modern web standards and new features.

faqs.question: What is Angular used for?
faqs.answer: Angular is a framework for building dynamic, single-page web applications with a focus on scalability and maintainability.

faqs.question: Is Angular free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Angular is an open-source framework available for free under the MIT license.

faqs.question: Do I need prior experience to use Angular?
faqs.answer: While basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is helpful, Angularâ€™s tutorials cater to both beginners and advanced developers.

faqs.question: What is the Angular CLI?
faqs.answer: The Angular CLI is a command-line tool that simplifies project setup, code generation, and application deployment.

faqs.question: Can Angular be used for mobile apps?
faqs.answer: Yes, Angular can be paired with tools like Ionic to build cross-platform mobile applications.

faqs.question: How does Angular compare to React or Vue?
faqs.answer: Angular offers a full-fledged framework with built-in tools, while React and Vue focus on flexibility and lighter setups.

faqs.question: Does Angular support server-side rendering?
faqs.answer: Yes, Angular Universal enables server-side rendering for better performance and SEO.
